testcase.name: Operation 'next' on class 'Waiting' should return the same 'Waiting' value with a decremented 'countDown' until it is zero or negative
Operation 'next' on class 'Waiting' should return a 'Launched' value if the 'countDown' is zero or negative
Operation 'next' on class 'Launched' should return a 'Launched' value with a decremented 'countDown' until it is zero or negative
Operation 'next' on class 'Launched' should return a 'Launched' value with an updated 'position' until the 'countDown' is zero or negative
Operation 'next' on class 'Launched' should return an 'Exploding' value if the 'countDown' is zero or negative
Operation 'next' on class 'Exploding' should return an 'Exploding' value with a decremented 'countDown' until it is zero or negative

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: An exception was thrown during property evaluation: munit.ComparisonFailException: /Users/siarheimelnik/Projects/walkthrough/effective_scala/fireworks/src/test/scala/fireworks/FireworksSuite.scala:129 128: assertEquals(nextExploding.countDown, exploding.countDown - 1, "'countDown' must be decremented by one") [7m129: assertEquals(nextExploding.particles, exploding.particles.next, "'particles' must be updated to their next state")[0m 130: Prop.passed 'particles' must be updated to their next state [1m=> Obtained[0m Particles( value = List( Particle( horizontalSpeed = 8.45521696283934E-280, verticalSpeed = 3.091150290943247E-214, position = Cartesian( x = 1.683606544E9, y = 2.73591813E8 ), color = RGBA( r = UnsignedByte( value = 127 ), g = UnsignedByte( value = 127 ), b = UnsignedByte( value = -128 ), a = Normalized( get = 1.0 ) ) ), Particle( horizontalSpeed = -1.1205547617121601E-32, verticalSpeed = 7.17256297849971E134, position = Cartesian( x = -7.95804227E8, y = 1.484743691E9 ), color = RGBA( r = UnsignedByte( value = 110 ), g = UnsignedByte( value = 2 ), b = UnsignedByte( value = 110 ), a = Normalized( get = 1.0 ) ) ) ) ) [1m=> Diff[0m ([91m- obtained[0m, [92m+ expected[0m) Particle( [91m- horizontalSpeed = 8.45521696283934E-280,[0m [91m- verticalSpeed = 3.091150290943247E-214,[0m [92m+ horizontalSpeed = 0.0,[0m [92m+ verticalSpeed = -1.3,[0m position = Cartesian( Particle( [91m- horizontalSpeed = -1.1205547617121601E-32,[0m [92m+ horizontalSpeed = 0.0,[0m verticalSpeed = 7.17256297849971E134,

testcase.name: Operation 'next' on class 'Exploding' should return a 'Done' value if the 'countDown' is zero or negative
Operation 'next' on class 'Particle' should return a 'Particle' value that has moved
